trans-unit.source: Contains meta-information on an individual property within the configuration.
This type cannot be inherited.
The <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformation> object contains the meta-information of an individual property within the configuration.
This object can be used when validating and changing the properties of an individual attribute.
The <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformation> object is derived from the associated <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection> object.
The <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection> object is derived from the associated <xref:System.Configuration.ElementInformation> object.
Gets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"></xref> object related to the configuration attribute.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> object is used to guide how the value of an attribute can be modified.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"></xref> object.
Gets an object containing the default value related to a configuration attribute.
An object containing the default value of the configuration attribute.
Gets the description of the object that corresponds to a configuration attribute.
The description of the configuration attribute.
Gets a value specifying whether the configuration attribute is a key.
`true` if the configuration attribute is a key; otherwise, `false`.
Gets a value specifying whether the configuration attribute is locked.

The <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformation.IsLocked%2A> property returns `true` when the related element is locked by the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement.LockAttributes%2A> or <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement.LockAllAttributesExcept%2A> property.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformation"></xref> object is locked; otherwise, `false`.
Gets a value specifying whether the configuration attribute has been modified.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformation"></xref> object has been modified; otherwise, `false`.
Gets a value specifying whether the configuration attribute is required.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformation"></xref> object is required; otherwise, `false`.
Gets the line number in the configuration file related to the configuration attribute.
The line number associated with the source configuration file.
Zero is returned when there is no source configuration file.
A line number of the configuration file.
Gets the name of the object that corresponds to a configuration attribute.
The name of the <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformation"></xref> object.
Gets the source file that corresponds to a configuration attribute.
The source file of the <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformation"></xref> object.
Gets the <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the object that corresponds to a configuration attribute.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformation"></xref> object.
Gets a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorBase"></xref> object related to the configuration attribute.
Use the returned <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorBase> object to validate the value configuration attribute.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorBase"></xref> object.
Gets or sets an object containing the value related to a configuration attribute.
An object containing the value for the <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformation"></xref> object.
Gets a <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyValueOrigin"></xref> object related to the configuration attribute.
The <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyValueOrigin> object describes how the value of the configuration attribute was determined.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyValueOrigin"></xref> object.
